ygData.subject: Re: Sacrement icon and ingot?
ygData.msgSnippet: i do know where the one in mm spawns, but was wondering if anyone knew where the one in rathe mtns spawns.....would love to see what this combo produces
ygData.messageBody:
i do know where the one in mm spawns, but was wondering if anyone knew where
the one in rathe mtns spawns.....would love to see what this combo produces

(\/)ystix

> Ok.. cleric message boards are filling with news of a sacrement icon and
> ingot to make something (weapon maybe?)
>
> Icon found in MM and Ingot found in Rathe Mtn?
>

> hoping that somewhere out there is a GOOD new cleric quest item!
